name: ADULT VACCINE ACCESS COALITION
sampleDescriptions: Part D cost sharing and quality measures for vaccines.

CDC Immunization Program: National Vaccine Program Office;
Access to immunizations, Health information technology, Quality measures, and Medicare Part D cost sharing for vaccines within CDC coordination on hepatitis B immunization and rural health clinics reimbursement for vaccines in the FY 19 LHHS Appropriations bill.

CDC Immunization Program: National Vaccine Program Office;
Access to immunizations, Health information technology, Quality measures, and Medicare Part D cost sharing for vaccines and CDC coordination on hepatitis B immunization in the House and Senate FY 19 LHHS Appropriations bill (P.L. 115-245).

CDC Immunization Program: National Vaccine Program Office;
Access to immunizations, Health information technology, Quality measures, and Medicare Part D cost sharing for vaccines, and CDC coordination on hepatitis B immunization and vaccine administration in the FY 19 LHHS Appropriations bill (P.L. 115-245).

CDC Immunization Program:
Access to immunizations, Health information technology, Quality measures, and Medicare Part D cost sharing for vaccines, and CDC coordination on hepatitis B immunization and vaccine administration in the House and Senate FY 20 LHHS Appropriations bill (H.R. 2740).

Part D cost sharing and quality measures for vaccines;
Protecting Seniors Through Immunization Act, S.1872.

CDC Immunization Program;
Access to immunizations, Health information technology/IIS, Quality measures, and Medicare Part D cost sharing for vaccines, and  hepatitis B immunization and vaccine administration in the House and Senate FY 21 LHHS Appropriations bill and H.R. 7614, the House FY21 LHHS Appropriations bills.
